songs.title: Sea Shells
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
By the window
Since time began
Watch the wind blow
Sculpting sand

[Hook 1]
All in letters bound in string
Life is slowly unraveling

[Verse 2]
Building castles
Tear them down
Mr. Prince has lost her crown

[Hook 2]
All in letters bound in string
Time is slowly unraveling

[Bridge]
She sells
Empty sea shells
Lost in the ocean
Through the window
We can see
Sand and biscuits
Cups of tea

[Hook 1] (x2)

[Outro]
She sells
Empty sea shells
She sells
Empty sea shells
